name: Tumble Canyon
description:
OJam Game Jam game. My first game jam ever. A fun chill roll through a desert canyon as a tumbleweed. Sow your seeds and make your way towards the waterfall cave, where you will be shown the fruits of your labor. Explore and enjoy the environment.

Controls:

WASD-movement

Q- drop seed

Left/Right Arrow Keys- cycle through placed seeds

Space(Hold 3 seconds)- spawn at current seed.
